tool_description: Generates comprehensive reports summarizing fake review detection results, patterns found, and recommended actions for stakeholders.

total_reviews_analyzed.description: Total number of reviews in the analysis

detection_patterns.description: Array of detected fake review patterns

product_categories.description: Product categories affected by fake reviews

report_format.description: Output format for the report (summary, detailed, executive)

include_visualizations.description: Whether to include data visualization descriptions

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for analysis period
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date
Invalid review count: Total reviews analyzed must be a positive integer
Empty required arrays: flagged_review_ids, detection_patterns, and product_categories cannot be empty
Invalid report format: Use one of [summary, detailed, executive]
usage: Provide analysis period, review counts, flagged reviews, and detected patterns. Configure report_format and optional features as needed.

report_summary.description: Executive summary of findings and key metrics

fake_review_rate.description: Percentage of reviews identified as potentially fake

top_risk_categories.description: Product categories with highest fake review rates

recommended_actions.description: List of recommended actions to address fake reviews
